subject: From Mr.Aziz M.Hawa
body:
FROM MR.AZIZ  M. HAWA
ACCONUNTANT UNION
TOGOLISE BANK(U.T.B)
LOME TOGO WEST AFRICA
CALL ME(+228)98-111-55.

Dear Friend,

Please, I want to introduce myself and this business opportunity to you My 
name is Mr.Aziz M. Hawaa, bank accountant.

I wish to know if we can work together. I would like you to stand as the 
next of kin to my deceased client who made some deposits of $10,500,000.00 
to my bank.

He died without any registered next of kin and as such the funds now have an 
open beneficiary mandate.

If you are interested you should call  me immediately on my private number
(+228-98-111-55) as soon as you receive this letter for more explanation.

Best regards,
AZIZ M.HAWA.
